title: Could we get a sneak peek of the upcoming Ashe changes?
body: I wanna know what's coming up for my favorite marksman. =)

Hey I don't know if these notifications reach you, but I just wanted to say I think you're doing an amazing job at transparency with the current Garen rework. Your patience clearly shows; you have very intelligent, tactful yet receptive responses. More than that, I think your design reworks make a lot of sense from a theoretical standpoint on what you're trying to achieve. Anyways, I know it must be tiring to be under constant criticism and have to field all kinds of speculative questions from the community, so I just wanted to provide some encouragement and appreciation. I find what you're doing exemplary for a game design employee.

Hello Repertoir,

Thanks for the heads up; glad I found this thread and your post as I'll be eagerly awaiting the info. Oddly enough I just began playing Ashe again after having been away from League for a long while and the news of the rework is a bit funny given I had just made a thread earlier today mentioning champions I thought might be in line for a rework/what I'd like Riot to consider putting into their kits. There is one thing I'd like to know about Ashe though I'm hoping you can answer for me ahead of time: Will the design team give Woad Ashe an in-game dagger hanging off her belt the way she does in her splash art? One of the reasons I had bought that skin was because of the dagger which was sadly missing on her in-game.

Looking forward to your response;
Mr. Beane, the Poro esq.
